mapper.select: SELECT PrivateDomainDataID, DisplayName,Abstract, Description,PrivateContext,DefaultYN FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_privatedomaindata WHERE CustomCategory = 'APPROVERCONTEXT' AND OwnerID = #{userID} ORDER BY DisplayName ASC
SELECT GroupID, GroupCode, GroupName, Description FROM covi_approval4j.jwf_group WHERE EntCode = #{entCode} ORDER BY SortKey

SELECT ur.UserCode AS PERSON_CODE , 0 AS PERSON_ID , ur.MultiDisplayName AS DISPLAY_NAME , bg.DeptCode AS UNIT_CODE , bg.MultiDeptName AS UNIT_NAME ,concat(bg.JobTitleCode,';',bg.MultiJobTitleName) AS JOBTITLE_Z ,concat(bg.JobLevelCode,';',bg.MultiJobLevelName) AS JOBLEVEL_Z ,concat(bg.JobPositionCode,';',bg.MultiJobPositionName) AS JOBPOSITION_Z ,bg.CompanyCode AS ENT_CODE FROM covi_smart4j.sys_object_user_basegroup AS bg LEFT JOIN covi_smart4j.sys_object_user AS ur ON ur.UserCode = bg.UserCode WHERE ur.IsUse = 'Y' AND ur.UserCode IN
#{userCode}
